inn1.comm: and a straight ball on middle, swinging just a touch away but Smith jabs down on it solidly
excellent line from Zaheer, just short of a length and Smith comes tentatively forward

GODDIM! Swinging in, it straightens on Smith who comes down the track and that's absolutely plumb. Dreadful, careless shot from Smith. That's it from me. It's over to the venerable Sriram Veera whose office has now regained power. For now.
ooh....Zaheer swung this one back in but started around the legstump, Kallis stretched out and it brushed his pads and ran to the fineleg fence
Huge appeal for lbw from Zaheer but Sir, it pitched outside leg and btw was missing the stumps too. Apart from that nothing wrong with the appeal...
Sreesanth gets that one swinging in with the angle, ends up on the legs, attempted flick shot but doesnt' connect
peach of a delivery. Landed just outside the offstump, opn a length, and moved away. Bit of bounce as well and Kallis ended up poking at it, inside the line and was beaten
Better from Kallis. This time, to a somewhat similar ball, he stretches his left foot out, covered the stumps and shouldered arms.
Full and on the middle, Kallis clips it away to right of Agarkar, at mid-on, who moves quickly and has a shy at the non-striker's end
Sreesanth ends the over - fine one at that - with a delivery whizzing through the corridor of uncertainity. Bosman was pretty certain though... let it go
Angled across, left him after landing on a length, left alone
And again.
Again he pings the channel outside the offstump, again Kallis lets that one fly through to Dhoni
Leans forward to a length-delivery on the stumps, offers the full face of the blade in defense
Lovely delivery. This one came back in slightly, and caught Kallis by surprise. It landed on the perfect length and rapped Kallis on the thigh pad

Cleaned him up! Yorker! Sreesanth pings the blockhole and Bosman, caught in a tangle with his feet movement - his left foot was pressed a bit too across- and his   desperate wave of the bat didn't make contact with the cherry.
outside the offstump, left alone
thrusts his left foot out, to a full-delivery just outside off, defends. The ball rolls over the on side and Sreesanth rushes across to pick the ball
In the zone outside off, Gibbs is not in a mood to flirt.
Sliding down the pads, full in length, Gibbs fails to get a tickle.
around the off stump line and pushed to cover point. Maiden over. Both the bowlers are spot  on with their line and length
Overpitched...  just outside off... driven to mid-off. Doesn't time it well though.
Length-delivery on the stumps, out comes the dour defensive bat of Kallis. Ball drops on the turf.
beaten! Kallis goes in search of a ball that was angled across and returns emptyhanded.
That ODI dab shot to thirdman helps him retain the strike
ooh.. almost edged that outswinger. Lands on a length, just outside the offstump, and Kallis,again, flirts with it and is beaten
Super shot. Classic cover drive. MInd you it was a overpitched delivery, but he put it away in style. Head over the ball and all that jazz. Pleasing to the eye.

And again. This time bit squarer. Again erring on the fullish side and Kallis caresses it past cover point. Leaned forward and opened the face of the blade at the last minute to cover the line and whipped it past cover point
corrects the length, but oversteps in process. Defended off the front foot
Gets some bounce.  It landed back of length, outside the offstump and reared up, Kallis adjusted by hopping up in the air and taps it down
Tip and run. will retain the strike again! Just pushed to right of cover and off he went
pings the offstump line, Kallis comes forward in defense. Good cricket allround.
Whack! Kallis moved towards the length delivery, that was wide of the offstump, and hit it on the up through cover.
on the stumps, defended to the on side

Heavy ball as they say. Landed on a length, around the middle and leg and kicked up a bit. Kallis manages to keep it away. End of over and it will be Gibbs to face after remaining off strike for sometime
Outside the offstump, short in length and Gibbs dabs it past point, to right of thirdman
length-delivery on the middle, pushed to the on side
fuller, on the off and middle, comes in with the angle, Gibbs leans forward to push it back down the track.
similar length but slightly change in line - on the middle and leg, pushed to the on side
back of length this time, Sreesanth is changing it around, on the middle, Gibbs hops up, turns it to squareleg

Caught by Sehwag off a no-ball! Sreesanth bangs that one a bit short and on the off and middle stump line, Gibbs swivels to pull but pings Sehwag at squareleg. But Sreesanth had plonked his left foot well outside the popping crease..

Glorious shot. Whipped through the gap in midwicket. It was full and on the middle and leg, and he just leaned forward a touch and worked his wrists overtime to cream it through the on side. Fab shot. Well played sir.
Oho! Another eye-pleasing shot. Straight drive. Again on the fuller side, out came the bat ahead of the pads and met the ball flush in the middle. Sheer class.
After bleeding two fours with fullish deliveries, he switches to back of length and keeps Kallis quiet.
And again.
offers a fullish-delivery, Kallis drives it but straight to mid-off.
Outside off, short of length, dabbed to thirdman.
Short of length, outside the off stump,  Kallis tries to force it off the back foot , without getting into a proper position,  but doesn't make proper contact. Too much greed is not that good!
No indulgence but goes for abstinence. Makes the effort to get behind the line and defends dourly.
bit of width outside off, but still back of length, Kallis squaredrives on the up. Damn fine looking shot, just a single though.
length-delivery that lands on the middle and leg and slips further down. Gibbs is rapped on the pads, Sreesanth appeals for lbw but it was going down
Imperious. Elegant. Class. Bit of width outside the offstump, and Kallis moved quickly towards the cherry and drove on-the-up through cover.
on the stumps, on a length, Kallis moves back and across to get behind the line and pushes it away to the offside
Another fab shot from the factory of Kallis. On the pads, full in length, and Kallis put it away with his exaggerated wrist movement past squareleg
length delivery, on the off stump line, defended away.
on the money. right on the middle stump line, on a length, pushed to on side
just outside the offstump, Gibbs doesn't move towards the ball, stays adjacent to the line and pushes the bat, away from his body, to ping the cover
Easy single. Full and on the middle and leg, worked to the midwicket and off they go
Tip and run. Another easy run. Kallis leans forward to a length-delivery on the offstump line, pushes it towards backward point
Nice skillful dab to thirdman boundary. It was outside the offstump, Gibbs took the bottom hand out of the bat-handle, opened the bat-face slightly and ran it past the slip fielder.
whipped from the middle stump. He thrust his left foot across and had to play around it. But he does it often, gets into trouble occasionally
pings the channel outside the offstump, left alone
full. on the middle, enough for Gibbs to drive it forcefully and it was enroute to the straight boundary but Agarkar, at mid-on, moved smartly and threw himself to his left to make a half-stop
on the legs, tickled past squareleg
angles it across, full in length, Gibbs reaches forward, bat well ahead of his body, drives to mid-off. He is standing deep and they get an easy single.
back-of-length, just outside the offstump and back goes Kallis to dab it to thirdman region
Agarkar hits the deck, on a length, outside the offstump, Kallis shuffles sideways rather than his usual back and across, pushes  his bat , away from his body,  and dabs to thirdman
Gibbs pulls but can't beat Sehwag, standing at squareleg.
drifting on to the pads, worked around the corner for a single.
Tip and run must be an official sport in South Africa. Again, the dead-bat comes out, taps the ball close on the offside,  just a look up at the partner and  off they rush across. Easy.
Thwack! Bosh! Add more such expressions  from the Batman and Robin comic strips. Short and outside the offtstump and Gibbs crashes it past cover point.
Successive fours for Gibbs. The ball was wrong on a couple of things. Too full, too much width outside off and Gibbs drills it to the left of mid-off.
pings the back of length, Gibbs goes back to defend. Whenever the bowlers have erred on length, they have been punished
Pathan stumbled at the release. His action went awry as the upperbody nearly collapsed but somehow he managed to get it around the offstump, pushed to cover
on the middle, on a length, turned to the on side
Almost a run out. Kallis had pushed short of cover and set off immediately and had Kaif, who had rushed forward, hit the stumps Kallis would have been dead
just on the off stump line, run down to thirdman
in the zone outside the offstump, short in length, Kallis goes for a stand-and-deliver stuff but doesn't make contact
He makes contact this time, but fine fielding by Dinesh Karthik at point and it's just a dot ball
He walks forward a bit, reaches the pitch of the fullish-delivery on the middle and leg, whips it through the midwicket gap.
short of a good length delivery, pitched on middle and leg and shaping back in - Gibbs pushes forward to defend but fails to make contact. Ball clips the pad and rolls away on the leg side
once again Pathan drifts onto the pads and Gibbs wristfully works away towards square leg. Excellent diving stop by Jaffer there saves runs but fails to cut off the single

and the one that angles across the right-hander, he is mixing it up here but needs to work on his length - this one was once again bit short and Kallis efortlessly steered it down to third man for a single
punched off the back-foot to the cover region
on the middle and off stump line, defended watchfully

bad line - drifting down the leg side but Gibbs fails to get bat on ball - off the pads to the short fine leg region and they scamper through for a single. Dhoni moved across quickly and negated the chance of a second run

and he strikes first ball! slightly short and this one went straight on after hitting the deck - Kallis looking to chop it away off the back-foot ends up with a faint edge and Dhoni held on well to fairly hard chance.
driven away through cover point and he is off the mark first ball.
quicker delivery, Gibbs takes it on the pad - loud appeal for lbw turned down
swept away behind square on the leg side
short and close to the off stump, punched off the back-foot to sweeper cover
tucked away well wide of the fielder at cover
on the hips, tickled to fine-leg where Kumble makes a good sliding stop, Villiers slips while turning for the second run, gets up, again slips but makes it through
overpitched, no swing, driven to mid-off
on the middle and off, Gibbs leans forward to push it back along the track.
Dismissed from his presence. It was banged in short and Gibbs pulls it through the midwicket gap.
fuller, on the middle and off, defended of the front foot
Violence! Tossed up full, a tad outside the offstump and Villiers ran down the track and hit it with the spin over long-off
Revenge! Traps him in front with a slider. Landed on the off and middle, on a length, slided in and beat the intended sweep shot and rapped him plumb in front.
topspinner on the off and middle, Boucher leans forward to push it away.
fuller, slides in and raps Boucher on his pads as he tries to flick it away. Dhoni and Kumble appeal but it was going down
leans forward, pushes it to cover point and an easy single results
on the stumps, defended away.
pushes it across, well outside the offstump, Boucher walks across, covers the stumps, let it go through to Dhoni
again angled across, pushed to cover
length-delivery on the offstump line, pushed to the onside
short in length, on the offstump line, Boucher stands tall, whips it forecefully past mid-off. Not an easy shot to play. Sreesanth, at mid-off,  dives to his right but only meets air.
length-delivery on the middle and off, Boucher comes to front foot, sees the bounce, shifts his weight back and taps it in front of him
on the leg and middle, turned to long-leg
full and on the leg and middle, Boucher leans forward, whips it past square-leg and gets couple of runs
And again. Kumble is sliding it a bit on the legstump line.
corrects the line, just outside the offstump, punched to deep cover
full and driven to long-off
slower through the air this time, just outside the offstump, Boucher had to wait for it to arrive, adjusts and drives it to deep cover
on the offstump line, slides in after landing on a length, goes back to turn it to leg side
on the offstump line, back of length, pushed to point. Boucher practises that stroke again..
angled across, swatted back to the bowler. It was outside the offstump, dunno why Boucher chose to hit against the line, could have pinged the point or thirdman region
Another dot ball. Again just outside the offstump, punched towards mid-off
Excellent bit of fielding from Sreesanth, at mid-on, keeps Boucher on strike. Full and driven straight but Sreesanth moved to his left and pulled off a diving stop.
First wide of the innings. down the leg side.
almost lemon-cut back to the stumps. It was short in length, angled across and Boucher stabbed at it, got an inside edge which took the ball close to the stumps. Dhoni makes the stop

almost shovelled back to the bowler. Again short of length and angling across, Boucher opened up his stance and tried to force it off the back foot, gets an leading edge and it goes in the air to the right of Pathan who couldn't reach it
leans forward to push a length-delivery back to the bowler
just outside the offstump, pushed to cover point and they rush across
attempted sweep shot, gets a bottom-edge to shortish fineleg
outside off, dabbed to wide of Agarkar at thirdman and they rush across for couple of runs
fuller, on the offstump line, pushed to cover
slightly shorter in length, Gibbs goes back and across, slams it on-the-up to deep cover
attempted yorker, ends up as a low full-toss, on the offstump line, driven to cover
in the zone around the offstump, a length-delivery, Boucher pushes back, works his wrists, turns the ball to square-leg. No chance of a run
Short and pulled to longleg
clipped away off the pads to the deep backward square leg region
quicker and on the pads, tapped away on the leg side
full and straight, Gibbs gets inside the line and drives it straight back to the bowler - presented the full face of the bat
line and length delivery, defended stretching well forward
worked away well wide of the fielder at midwicket - Kumble right on the money here
another quick over comes to and end. full and close to the off stump line, Boucher pushes forward, gets close to the line and taps it away towards cover - no room for a single
driven away towards mid-off and some sloppy fielding from Zaheer Khan gives away two runs - Agarkar is not impressed and he has a kick at the ball when the throw came in from the deep
bouncer and Gibbs ducks under it
good length delivery, Gibbs gets well forward and drives it straight to the fielder at cover
gets right behind the line and defends it away towards cover
goes for the drive and ends up with a thick edge - Gibbs beaten by the extra bounce there
short ball, coming in with the angle - Boucher nicely gets on top of the bounce and pulls it away right into the gap between mid-on and midwicket
driven back to the bowler
goes for the sweep and gets hit on the pad
quicker delivery outside the off stump, driven well wide of the fielder at cover
stopped a bit - Boucher gets behind the line and defends it back to the bowler
another right delivery and Boucher forces it away well wide of the fielder at cover
a rare bad delivery, short and drifting down the leg side - Gibbs goes down on one knee and slaps it down to fine leg for a single. More of a premeditated shot.
full and angling in, Gibbs nicely flicks it away towards midwicket and a full length dive from Sehwag there saves runs
driven away off the back-foot, through the gap between the cover fielder

short of a good length delivery, drifting back in from wide outside the off stump, Boucher stands tall on the back-foot and drives it away towards ciover point - more of a push than a thumping drive - point fielder hustles across quickly and cuts off the single
short and wide outside the off stump, Boucher has a go at it and the ball zips past the outside edge
good length delivery outside the off stump and Boucher gets it wide of the fielder at mid-off
What good is an Agarkar over without a boundary. Full and on the pads - Gibbs flicks it away with a touch of artistry and the ball races away to the midwicket fence
driven down the ground to the long-off region
Kumble continues to impress - on the middle and off stump line and turning away - Gibbs on the front-foot defending
worked away towards midwicket, no room for a single there
bit of extra bounce and Gibbs drives it away in the air to sweeper cover, 'catch it' was the call but the diving fielder at cover didn't even get close
tucked away towards square leg and they scamper through for a single
short ball, was there to be hit but Gibbs fails to cash-in. Good looking pull but the ball went straight to the fielder at deep midwicket
pushed away towards midwicket, Kaif cuts off the single
turned away through midwicket
tossed up on the stumps, Boucher moves across and taps it away through square leg
bit too fuller, driven down to long-on for yet another easy single
turned away off the front-foot to the midwicket region
quicker delivery to end the over - bit of a surprise delivery and Gibbs gets hit on the pad. Impact was well outside the line of the off stump and the lbw appeal is duly turned down
played away towards midwicket. Sehwag once again pulls off a good diving stop
forced away towards cover
Tendulkar is running in and bowling leg-breaks.  turned away off the pads to deep midwicket
fifty! driven down to long-off -  under pressure the fielder in the deep fumbles and they scamper through for the second
down the leg stump - happens when you try too many things.
better line and length - defended watchfully
fuller length delivery and Gibbs finds the fielder at cover
punched straight back down the track, Sehwag moves across to his right and cuts off the single
worked away towards short fine leg
swept away with the turn to the square leg region - easy single
Gibbs plays straight and gets it down to long-on, again just a single
flighted delivery, boucher goes right back and flicks it away behind square
and the milking continues - shuffles across and works it away well wide of the fielder at midwicket
driven down to long-on - as easy as it gets
goes for the drive, ball clips the inner half of the bat and rolls back to Tendulkar
turned away off the pads to the midwicket region - Tendulkar running through the over here. I need a four to relax a bit
quicker delivery on the pads, Boucher fails to make contact and the ball rolls away off the pads
tossed up - Boucher gets forward and drives it down to long-on. 150 comes up for South Africa
on the middle and leg stump line, Gibbs shuffles across and tucks it down to fine leg for a single
turned away towards square leg, Sreesanth and Kumble run into each other and the ball goes through
on the pads, Gibbs fails to make contact
flicked away through square leg for a single
quicker delivery outside the off stump, went straight on and Boucher is beaten going for the sweep
drifting down the leg side, pulled straight to the fielder at short fine leg
got'im! fuller in length, pitched close to the off stump line and turning in - Boucher swipes across the line and is trapped plumb in front, easy decision for the umpire. South Africa five down
driven down to long-on and the single brings Kemp on strike

golden duck! that's cricket for you - 100 in the previous match, 0 in the next. Fraction short and close to the off stump line, Kemp attacks the ball in an attempt to pierce the off side ring, fails to keep it down and the ball goes straight to Sehwag at point
driven down to long-off and Pollock is off the mark straightaway
defended with a straight bat and the ball rolls back to the bowler
flicked away through midwicket
turned away through square leg
defended outside the off stump
forced away on the leg side
glanced away behind square on the leg side
turned away on the leg side, more of a defensive prod
slightly short and Gibbs pulls it away through sqaure leg
full and on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
starts off with a quicker delivery, Gibbs plays it safe
full and close to the off stump line, driven down to long-off
pulls it back a bit - Pollock reaches out for it and sweeps it away well in front of square leg
punched down to long-off
defended
looping delivery, pushed away towards cover
short ball and Sehwag pulls it away to deep midwicket
tossed up, Pollocks comes down the track to the pitch of the delivery and lofts it high and handsome over the long-on fence - took on the fielder in the deep but he was never in danger
turned away towards short fine leg, Tendulkar dives in instalments and the ball races away to fine leg it's Tendulkar
forced away towards towards cover
turned away towards midwicket
defended back to the bowler
driven down to long-on, runs coming in a trickle at the moment
fuller in length, forced away straight to the fielder at cover
punched away off the back-foot and Pollock finds the gap between cover and point. There is protection in the deep
bowled slower through the air - Gibbs waits for the ball and runs it away wide of the fielder at gully
strays on to middle and leg. Pollock nicely shuffles across, gets into a good position and flickes it away through midwicket for an easy single
short and wide outside the off stump, cut away straight to the fielder at point
slightly short and turning away. Pollock nicely opens the face of the bat and runs it away behind the wicket on the off side but fails to get it past the fielder at short fine leg
full and on the stumps, defended back to the bowler
punched away towards cover. Bit of a mix-up going go the single but Kaif fails to pick it up cleanly and no damage is done - In the end they decided against the single
another dot ball - driven well but straight to Kaif at cover, what an over.
turned away off the back-foot and finally Pollock squeezes in a single
defended outside the off stump
short and wide outside the off stump - had four wirtten all over it, missing was the gift wrap - Pollock leans back and chops it away to the backward point fence
tossed up outside the off stump, Pollock stretches forward and drives it away to sweeper cover for a single
another flighted delivery, swpet away with ease to deep backward square leg
driven off the back-foot, sweeper on the off side is busy
turned away towards midwicket, excellent tumbling stop from Karthik there saves runs
solid defensive shot - there is a buzz around the ground, something is cooking - no doubt
another tight delivery, forced away towards cover - well bowled Kumble
driven down to long-off, again just a single
comes down the pad and takes it on the pad, beaten by the length there
worked away off the pads to the square leg region
short ball and Pollock pounces on it lucky a hungry Lion - massive pull and the ball screamed away to the midwicket fence
enough room to cut and Gibbs gets it away through point
tapped away on the off side
flicked away to the midwicket region - so far so good for India
swept away nicely but just a single

shot! comes down the track to the pitch of the delivery and lofts it over the fielder at extra cover - Zaheer Khan hurtles across but after doing all the hard work he allows the ball to roll over the ropes. That should have been stopped
worked away to fine leg, easy single to end the over
Pollock too comes down the track and has a swing , ball clips the inner half of the bat and rolls away towards midwicket
full and on the stumps - turned away towards wide mid-on, dangerous quickly single called for - Sehwag misses the stumps at the bowler's end and Gibbs makes it across safely
sweep wroks - it always works, well almost - another easy single down to deep square leg
quicker delivery and Pollock gets hit on the pad
worked away on the leg side and that's ends a good spell from the veteran
on the stumps and Pollock hammers it over the long-on fence
drifting across, driven away well wide of the fielder at cover
short ball, turning in from wide outside the leg stump, Gibbs goes low and pulls it away to deep backward square leg
tucked away behind point, easy single

bowled from round the stumps, land in the slot on the middle and off stump line - Gibbs gets well inside the line and drills it through the gap between mid-off and cover - this is turning out to be a good over for South Africa
goes low down and slog sweeps it to deep midwicket. 14 off the over - a good one for South Africa

starts off with a short ball on the middle and leg stump line, ball stopped a bit after hitting the deck, probably the slower delivery - Gibbs has a mighty swing at it but misses the target by miles - ball rolls away off the shoulder and they scamper through for a leg-bye
excellent bowling - follows up the slower ball with a yoker and Pollock ends up driving it straight back to the bowler. Zak is back for sure.

pulled away at one bounce to the fielder at midwicket - Pollock takes off for a suicidal run but Gibbs stands his ground. Kumble's shy at the stumps misses the stumps, but Dhoni running in from behind grabs the ball with both hands and punches the stumps - Pollock is inches away from the crease but that's enough for the tv-umpire to press the button-of-death.
turned away towards short midwicket
full and straight, driven down to long-off for a single
right in the blockhole, Hall jams his bat down and digs it away towards cover - End of a fantastic over
full and wide outside the off stump, Gibbs makes room and finds himself far away from the ball
high fulltoss and Gibbs hammers it away to deep cover
driven down to long-on, again just a single
again full and outside the off stump, Gibbs once again makes room and finds himself out of reach
attempted yorker ends up as a low fulltoss and Gibbs thuds straight to the fielder at long-on
gets forward and drives it away to sweeper cover - another good over for India comes to an end
starts off with a slower ball and Hall is beaten
played away wide of the fielder at long-on, sprints across for the first run and they make it back safely for the second
off the edge to silly mid-off - Khan moves across and has a shy at the bowler's end stumps but fails to hit the target - Hall lives on
full and on the stumps, yorker gone wrong - Gibbs gets under it and lofts it down to the long-on fence - one bounce and over the rope she goes
another fuller length delivery, driven past the fielder at cover
pulled away to midwicket, not a well timed shot
driven away to deep cover
that's a massive hit! low fulltoss outside the off stump, again the yorker gone wrong - Hall swings across and gets it on the middle - ball sails over the long-on fence

driven away to wide long-on. Hall is bit late off the blocks - Karthik's throw comes in at the striker's end - Hall is home, wait he has forgotten to ground his bat. They go upstairs and the red light flashes.
swing and a miss outside the off stump, Gibbs was half way down the track even before the ball was delivered and he makes it across safely
fulltoss, driven straight to the fielder cover
excellent delivery to end the over and the innings - yorker and it goes through Nel

inn2.comm: well outside the off stump, it started swinging away a bit too early, Jaffer lets it go through
Much closer to the offstump, Jaffer shuffles across, covers the offstump and shoulders arms
Last time he batted Jaffer got out in the third ball. Survives this time. Another one pinging the channel outside off, left alone
ooh.. that one kicked up from a length. on the middle stump line. Jaffer is surprised by the extra bounce but adjusts to keep it down
length-delivery on the offstump line, Jaffer goes back and across, drives on the up to cover. Lots of chatter going on in the field

off the mark in style. Short of length and outside the offstump, Jaffer goes back and across to force it through the offside ring. Nice looking shot. He likes them there. Prefers to play off the back foot.
down comes the bat from its apogee, drives a fullish delivery to cover point.
Close to the offstump line, Sehwag is bit cramped up as he is looking to drill through the off side ring, too close to cut, he ends up punch-driving it to cover
just outside off again, short of length, dabbed to right of thirdman
beaten for pace. That one, delivered from wide of the crease, comes in at the body of Jaffer who is cramped up and is rapped on the thigh pad
on the off stumpline, coming in with the usual Ntini angle, pushed to cover.
beaten! In that zone outside off, Sehwag flashes at it, tries to hit on the up and misses.
There you go. Sehwag ringed the room service and Pollock delivers a short and wide one and Sehwag lashes at it with vengeance. Whiplashed it to point fence
In the channel outside the offstump, another length-delivery, and this time Sehwag doesn't flirt
on the hips, bit of bounce, Sehwag hops straight back, rathen than the orthodox back and across, tucks it behind squareleg
length-delivery whizzing past the offstump, left alone. Jaffer likes to sit on that back foot. If the bowlers can draw him forward and suck him into a drive, it should get interesting
And again. Left alone.

Crowd roar as Sehwag is beaten by the bounce. Ntini hit the deck short of length and on the offstump line, Sehwag goes back and tries to square-drive, rather than the horizontal stroke, and is beaten as the ball climbs up at pace
Whack! This time the horizontal shot was out. Again short and outside off, Sehwag goes back and cuts it over backward point. It races to the boundary.
on the body, trying to cramp him up, he goes back, tucks it to the on side for a single
length-delivery honing in on the offstump line, Jaffer goes back, gets behind the line and pushes it to the offside
And again. He goes back, and has time to play the ball. Er.. thats why he is the Test opener, only thing as I said before, he is bit iffy on the front foot. He is late in coming forward at times
There you go. beaten on the front foot. Full and just outside the offstump, Jaffer is late in coming forward, attempts to drive but the ball had long whizzed past the outside edge
on the middle, on a length, Sehwag is caught at his crease, stabs at it, inside edge takes the ball to the on side
fuller and around the offstump line, driven to extra cover
fullish, just outside the offstump, Jaffer leans forward to push it towards cover
short and wide outside off, Jaffer goes back and across, cuts it down to the ground, past point for couple of runs. Missed out on a chance to put that bad delivery to boundary
on the middle and off, full in length, this time Jaffer leans forward, blocks
ooh... in the air, just past Gibbs at point. Four. Airy-drive as, again, Jaffer doesn't lean fully forward, squaredrives a fullish delivery outside off and it flies to right of Gibbs
short in length, landed outside the offstump and came in with the angle, Sehwag hops up, gets on top of the bounce, taps it in front of him.
Cheeky shot! Short and just outside off, Sehwag goes back, soft hands and sort of helps it over the slips
delivered from wide of the crease, honing in on the offstump, defended away to the offside. Boucher screams some words of encouragement to Ntini who walks back to his mark
Gotcha! Loose drive from Jaffer.  Slightly short in length, outside the offstump, Jaffer goes back and across, tries to squaredrive it ,away from his body, nicks it to  first slip.
Gets off the mark rightaway with a tip-and-run effort. Goes back to a short of length delivery, tickles it towards the left of  squareleg, runs with the shot

Ah! The slog is out but he doesn't make contact. Typical Sehwag, trying to counterattack out of trouble. He backed away to the legside, and went for a upper cut to a short-of-length delivery that bounced over his blade.
in the zone outside off, left alone

Sachin falls. Pollock again takes him out. Well outside the offstump, Tendulkar is bit unsure whether to leave or play, ends up doing both as he tries to get out of a shot at the last minute but by then it was too late. The ball had kissed the outside edge and Boucher fell low to his right to take a smart catch. Indian batting again in doldrums. Any one surprised?
Pollock tests him with a lovely outswinger. Full in length, swung late, but Kaif is up to it, leans forward, runs it down to thirdman

HOWZAT? screams Pollock as he raps Sehwag on the pads. But going down. It landed on the middle, jagged back and Sehwag, rather than going front, moves back and is caught out. But luckily, for him,  the ball did too much.
This time he moves forward and although he is struck on the front pad as he fails to make contact with his defensive prod, he is struck outside the line of offstump.
gets behind the line this time to a length-delivery on the middle, pushes it to the on side
Again delivered from wide of the crease, outside the offstump, left alone
That one jagged back in a long way after landing well outside the offstump, Kaif shoulders arms
lands on a length, outside the offstump, comes in with the angle, Kaif goes back, pushes it to point.
on that offstump line, defended of the front foot
sliced over point. Full and outside the offstump, the invitation and the bait was there, Kaif went for it, slashed it over point.
Much better from Kaif. Safer. Straight drive. Along the ground. Overpitched and Kaif leaned forward and presented the full face in his drive.
tip and run. On the off and middle, Sehwag got his bat down in a hurry, tapped it close on the leg side, a look up at Kaif who responded and off they went
length-delivery on the off and middle, coming in a touch, Kaif shuffles across, closes his bat face a bit as he punches it and the ball rolls towards mid-on
full face of the bat on display this time. Fullish and on the off, pushed to mid-off
back of length, a tad outside off, pushed to point. No chance of any run.
straightened after landing on a length, touch outside the offstump, pushed to point

Steered to thirdman boundary. It was short of length delivery , outside the off stump, Sehwag hopped back and opened the bat-face and ran it down fine. The thirdman was pretty wide, waiting for the upperslash that Sehwag plays.

Big wicket. Sehwag is back in the hutch. Full, straight on the middle, Sehwag tries to whip it across the line, ends up scooping it in the air, to the right of midwicket where Bosman takes a few steps before diving full length to take a very fine catch. India rocked by the seamers. Again.
wants to get off the mark with a push to the on side, Kaif refuses and Karthik rushes back to his crease
Outside the offstump, whizzes through the zone, Karthik is on his front foot, covers the stump, and shoulders arms
this one comes in, just over the off and middle stump line, Karthik moves back quickly, hops up, gets on top of the bounce, taps it close to the on side
all set, on the stumps, pushed to mid-on.
wide outside the offstump, rooms available sir, and Kaif tries to crash in with a fierce slash but pings Gibbs at  point
corrects the line and length, on the offstump line, Kaif leans forward to defend
drifts on the middle and leg stump line, tickled past square-leg. Pollock is visibly displeased with his line. Shake of head.
on the money this time. Hovering around the offstump line, pushed to the on side
beaten. Karthik lunges forward in defense, ends up playing inside the line as the fullish-delivery outside the offstump holds its line
length-delivery, lands outside the offstump, comes in with the angle, Kaif is on his front foot, the ball bounces a bit more than he expected, hits near the handle, runs to cover point
again that extra bounce but Kaif is prepared this time, hops back, gets on top, steers it to Gibbs at point
And again.
Hits the deck around back of length, climbs up, punched to cover point
from wide of the crease Ntini pings the fullish length, just outside the offstump, drawing Kaif forward, square-driven to Gibbs at point
a length delivery to end the maiden over. On the offstump line, again that push off the back foot, again Gibbs comes into play
well outside the offstump, sucking Karthik forward, he leans forward, is taken further out  by the outswing, but manages to push it along the ground to cover
beaten by the lack of bounce! Landed on a length, outside the offstump, came in a touch but didn't rise at all. Karthik is surprised and fails to get bat on the ball

A run out adds to the Indian misery. Karthik pushes a length-delivery on the middle and leg to the on side, gives a start, stops but by then the Kaif express had rushed along at a manic pace.  BOsman, at squareleg,  makes the stop, runs towards the non-striker's end, under-arms a throw to Pollock who whips off the bails. Meanwhile at the other end, Karthik gets into the crease first. Kaif, who was looking pretty good out there, is gone.

Almost a repeat of that run out. Karthik pushes to square-leg, takes a start, stops but Dhoni had not got on his bike. No damage done. Two wicketkeepers batting together. Takes me back to Chandrakant Pandit and Kiran More days.
ooh... that one flew off a length and Dhoni removed his bat out of the line in a hurry.
on the body, climbs from a length, turned to shortleg
bouncer. Flies above the head as Dhoni ducks under.
first run in 18 balls...  delivered from wide of the crease, comes in with the angle, just outside the offstump, steered to thirdman
around that offstump line, Karthik leans forward to push it to cover
overpitched on the middle, flicked through the midwicket gap. Easy.
on the off and middle stump line, pushed out towards mid-off.
just outside the offstump, partly edged partly steered to slip
Violence! Dhoni announces his intent with a drilled-drive through cover. Fullish delivery on the offstump line and creamed through covers.
bangs it in short, and on the leg stump line, Dhoni swivels to pull, doesn't make proper contact and it runs off the gloves to fine-leg boundary
full and fast, on off stump, Karthik plays it back to the bowler and Nel charges down to him during his follow through
banged in short outside off stump and Karthik tries to cut, the bounce beats the bat
another short one outside off stump, Karthik flays at it again but doesn't make contact, Boucher takes the ball at head height
Nel is having a go at Karthik now, he serves him another short one and cuts it back into the right hander this time, Karthik leans out of the way
pitches it full this time on off stump, Karthik leans into it on the front foot and pushes it through cover,
another no ball, Dhoni moves across and lets it go down leg side
there you go, another short one to end the over, Dhoni ducks under it
short and outside off stump, Karthik swishes at it and misses, how many times has he done that now?
a touch fuller and wide outside off, Dhoni stands onhis toes and flays it through cover point, it scorches to the fence
climbs off a length, outside the offstump, Dhoni hops up, taps it close on the offside
Banged in short, Dhoni swivels off his front foot to pull. The white ball flies over long leg. Dhoni continues to counterattack
Ouch. Lands on a length and crashes into the abdomen guard. Karthik doubles up in pain. Protection is always vital in many things in life.
in the zone outside off, left alone

edged to thridman region. Karthik takes out his bottom-hand out of the bat-handle as he pushes at a length-delivery outside the offstump. Prince, the substitue fielder, does the slide but couldn't keep the ball in
well outside the offstump, wasted delivery, left alone.
on the offstump line, again that short of length stuff, punched to cover

length-delivery, a tad outside the offstump, Dhoni tries to flay it through the line, doesn't move his feet, his bat comes outside the line, gets an inside edge on to the pads and it bounds off to the offside and they rush across for a single
full in length, outside the offstump, driven to the offside
short of length, in the zone outside the offstump, Karthik shuffles across, gets close to the ball, pushes it to cover point
deja-vu.
full, straight, on the offstump line, Dhoni pushes it out towards mid-off and sets off for a quick run. Completed comfortably.
length-delivery just outside offstump, Karthik allows the ball to come to him, opens the bat-face, runs it down to thirdman region where Prince makes the stop
fullish, drifting onto the pads, Dhoni fails to put it away. Usually  that line is dal chawal for the Indians
slashed past second slip. Short of length, outside the offstump, Dhoni goes back, throws his bat at it, with an opened-face, and it flies past the second slip
Gone..Dhoni falls slashing straight to thirdman. Short of length, outside the offstump, Dhoni hops back and upper-cuts it, ala Sehwag, over the slips and it flies high and straight to Prince.
Outside the offstump, Pathan shapes to shoulder arms, but is late in that decision, the ball hits the bat and runs to thirdman
angled across Pathan who shoulders arms.
full and on the middle stump line, Pathan drives, his bat-face closes, and the ball rolls over towards midwicket
pushed across Pathan who covers the stumps and shoulders arms
And again. With two slips in place Kallis is preying on Pathan's patience.
Again in that zone outside off, again Pathan lets it go.  Will Pathan's  patience run out and will he push hard at one such delivery?
on the middle and offstump line, defended of the front foot
full, on the off stump line, Karthik leans forward, pushes it towards mid-off.
full in length, tad outside off, comes in with the angle, Karthik opens the bat-face, steers it to point. No chance of a run.
Lovely straight drive. Fullish, on the middle, Karthik leans forward, drives in the V, and Kemp, from mid-on, runs back to make a good sliding stop near the ropes
Nel also tests Pathan in the zone outside the offstump line, left alone
lemon-cut to fineleg boundary. Landed on a length, angling across, hovers above the offstump line, Pathan is cramped up, his bat comes down in an angle, gets an inside edge.
overpitched outside the offstump, Pathan pings the gap in cover region. Classic cover drive.
pushed across Pathan who pushes forward in defense, gets an outside edge that takes the ball to point

Elegant straight drive. Kallis goes for a offcutter as he takes some pace off the ball, overpitches it in the process and Pathan caresses it past the bowler. The left elbow high, head over the ball, feet moving smoothly. It looked pretty good.
bangs in short and Pathan pulls it through the midwicket gap.
short of length, on the middle and leg, Pathan tucks it close on the leg side, in front of squareleg, and an easy single results. 11 runs came in that over.
from round the stumps, full in length, driven towards cover
hit the deck hard, around short of length, comes in from outside the offstump, "heavy ball" as they say, Pathan is right behind it, pushes it out towards cover
slightly back of length, tad outside the offstump, Pathan cuts, straight to point though
bouncer. Pathan sways away quickly.
climbs up from short of length, Pathan pushes it back down the track, Nel makes the stop, and lobs a throw over the batsman's head to Boucher and has a wide grin on his face!

oh ho! where did that coem from. Pathan moves forward to a fullish-delivery, and just creams it high and over long-off and it sails into the stands. Awesome strike.   Knifed through the line of the delivery.
outside offstump, left alone
Slices to his demise. Full and outside the offstump and rather than crashing it through covers, Karthik ends up slicing his drive, in the air, to thirdman. Another one is down, four to go.
full, slanted delivery, driven to mid-off
short of length, on the leg and middle, shovelled to right of midwicket
full and on the middle and off, Agarkar gets behind the line to push it to the offside
Short and outside off, cut to wide thirdman
slower delivery, angled across, left alone
good length delivery outside the off stump, driven off the back-foot and the ball goes straight to the fielder at point
pitched up and drifting into middle and leg. Agarkar finds the fielder at mid-on
Bouncer on the middle and off stump line. Agarkar ducks under it
another bouncer, bit too high and it's rightly called a wide
punched off the back-foot to the cover region
short ball outside the off stump, drifting in a touch - Agarkar winds up and unleashes a massive chop - apart from making contact he did everything right
pitched up and angling across - Pathan gets well forward to the pitch of the delivery and handsomely drives it through extra cover - good shot for just the one run
short of a good length delivery. Agarkar goes right back and thuds it straight to the fielder at mid-off
drama! goes for the drive, ball clips the inside half of the bat and rolls back to the bowler
pitched up on the pads, clipped away behind sqaure for an easy single
tucked away off the pads to the vacant midwicket region, easy single

fuller in length and coming in with the angle - Agarkar gets right behind the line and drives it straight back down the track to the long-off fence.  Presented the full face of the bat and the placement was immaculate

that's a shot and a half! bowled from round the stumps and fuller in length outside the off stump. Pathan hits on the up and the ball flies over the cover fielder - hard shot but he made it look simple
short and angling in, Pathan leaves it through to the keeper
driven away towards cover, not a well timed shot and the ball came off the inner half of the bat
another high bouncer from Nel - umpire not to happy with the height

nasty bouncer, pitched outside the off stump and coming in with the angle - Pathan fends at it in an attempt to save himself and the ball spoons up off the edge towards short backward point - Gibbs moves in quickly from point and throws himself forward but fails to get there in time - fantastic effort
defended on the back-foot and the ball rolls away towards short leg
glanced away to fine leg for a single

Agarkar too walks back, drawn by the warm nostalgic feelings for the place and by two sweet little words: "Dressing Room"  - harmless delivery outside the off stump, Agarkar goes for the lofted drive and the ball goes straight to Andrew Hall at sweeper cover. Three more to go.
left alone outside the off stump
flicked away to deep square leg
pitched up and drifting down the leg side, even Zaheer manages to flick it away to the fine leg fence. That bad a delivery
pitched up and drifting on to the stumps, turned away off the back-foot to the fine leg region
good length delivery, the off-cutter as they call it, Zaheer gets behind the line and forces it away towards cover point
similar line and length - again coming in with the angle. Solid defensive shot from Zaheer and the ball rolls away square on the leg side
bouncer down the leg side - Boucher had to dive across full length to his left to collect the ball. magnificent effort - not that it matters
steered away towards gully
drifting down the leg side, Khan fails to make contact and the ball rolls down to fine leg
worked away off the back-foot to the backward square leg region
short of a good length delivery, Pathan uses the depth of the crease to good use and wafts it away to deep midwicket for a brace
defended outside the off stump
forced away towards cover
pitched up on the pads and Zaheer clips it away through the gap between mid-on and midwicket, that's and impressive shot from the number nine.
on the middle and off stump line, Pathan waits for the ball and at the last moment forces it away towards cover
left alone outside the off stump. Safe shot
short of a good length delivery on the middle and leg stump line - Pathan stands tall on the back-foot and taps it away towards midwicket

Kallis too gets one to his name - short of a good length delivery, pitched outside the off stump and shaping away a touch. Too good a delivery for Zaheer Khan who has a poke at it and the edge flies straight to Boucher behind the stumps
good delivery first-up - Kumble leaves it through to the keeper. Safe shot - surely he has been watching some tv.
steered down to third man for an easy single
edged away in the air to the third man region - well wide of the slips and the man at backward point
short of a good length delivery, defended on the bak-foot and the ball rolls back to Kallis
punched away off the back-foot to the cover region - end of a successful over
short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, defended with a straight bat and the ball rolls back to the bowler
once again pushed back to the bowler with a straight bat
short of a good length and angling across. Pathan stands his ground and steers it down to third man for a single - bit of edge involved

in the channel outside the off stump and Kumble plays at it with his fishing rod. Loud confident appeal for caught behind turned down -  hard to safe if he got a touch on it, Pollock and Boucher was pretty convinced but umpire Jerling was not convinced
turned away towards short midwicket
edged away towards point
played away off the back-foot to the wide long-on region
short of a good length delivery. No room offered but Pathan leans back, makes room and taps it away behind point for a single
beaten outside the off stump
forced away off the front-foot to the cover region - Kumble calls for the single but Pathan sends him back
Short of a good length delivery, aimed at the hips - Kumble hops awkwardly and turns it away behind sqaure on the leg side
played away in the air to the third man region - 150 comes up for India
steered away towards gully, no room for a single
punched off the back-foot and the ball rolls straight back

another brut of a bouncer, pitched outside the off stump and nipping back in sharply - Kumble fends at it awkwardly and the ball lobs up off the edge - Smith at first slip moves across to his left and takes a comfortable catch
almost carried. cuts away in the air to the third man region - Valiant effort from Kallis in the deep ends in vain
yorker length delivery  - defended on the back-foot
short of a good length delivery, Sreesanth on the back-foot defending
another line and length delivery on the middle and off stump line, defended back down the track. Another successful Pollock over comes to an end
full and on the pads, Pathan shuffles across and plays it away towards square leg
defended wachfully
pitched up and drifting onto the pads, nicely turned away and Sreesanth finds the gap between mid-on and cover
full and on the stumps - Pathan swings across and the ball flies away to the square leg fence. Good meaty blow
played away towards mid-on
defended on the back-foot
on the stumps, Sreesanth gets bat on ball.
driven down to mid-on
short of a good length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, Sreesant fails to get bat on ball and gets hit on the rib-cage.
defended stretching forward, as awkward looking as it gets
short rising delivery outside the off stump, Sreesanth leans back and cuts hard - ball clips the bottom edge and goes to the keeper on the bounce
good length delivery outside the off stump, driven straight back to the bowler and that's the end of a fantastic spell
short ball. Pathan goes for the pull but fails to connect, ball clips the thigh pad and rolls down to the third man
driven back to the bowler
pulled away to deep midwicket for a brace
cut away straight to the point fielder
pitched up outside the off stump, driven down to mid-on
another fuller length delivery on the middle and leg stump line - Pathan once again finds the fielder at mid-on

And the inevitable. Short ball on the middle and off stump line, Sreesanth makes room and cuts hard, ball clips the shoulder of the bat and goes straight to de Villiers at cover. Sreesanth straightaway looked at the square leg umpire in an attempt to let him know that it was too high but by then the finger had gone up and the ice-box was being rushed out.
